name: dropdown-menu-09
title: Dropdown Menu 9
description: Start-aligned dropdown menu with edit, share, and delete actions

files.content: import { PencilLineIcon, UploadIcon, Trash2Icon } from 'lucide-react' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuGroup, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu' const DropdownMenuAlignStartDemo = () => { return ( Edit Share Delete ) } export default DropdownMenuAlignStartDemo
